| Property   | Attribute  | Description   | Type                   | Default |

| `readonly` | `readonly` | Readonly      | `boolean`              | `false` |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size          | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`  |
| `value`    | `value`    | Current value | `number`               | `0`     |
